import React from 'react'; const Terms = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using EduBlog, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

2. Subscription Services

Our premium subscription provides access to exclusive content. Subscriptions are billed according to the plan you select.

3. Payment Terms

All payments are processed securely through bKash. Subscription fees are non-refundable except as required by law.

4. Content Usage

All content on EduBlog is protected by copyright. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without permission.

5. Contact

If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at contact@edublog.com.

); }; export default Terms;
